definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
pavilion in the air (idiom); unrealistic Utopian construction/castles in Spain/imaginary future plans

sentences.english: Your plan is merely a castle in the air.
sentences.chinese: 你的計劃僅是空中樓閣而已。

sentences.english: My Shanghai mansion may prove to be a castle in Spain after all.
sentences.chinese: 我在上海買棟大廈的夢想只不過是座空中樓閣而已。

sentences.english: Huxin Pavilion is a three-story, double-eave ancient structure.
sentences.chinese: 湖心亭是一座三層重檐樓閣式的古亭。

sentences.english: Their calculations have all been proved to be castles in the air.
sentences.chinese: 他們的打算證明，全都不過是空中樓閣。

sentences.english: Tap-style pavilions for Fangmu structure Zhuanta, seven solid.
sentences.chinese: 塔爲樓閣式仿木結構磚塔，七層實心。

sentences.english: It covers an area of 290 hectares，and has halls，pavilions，corridors and bridges almost everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 它佔地290公頃，亭臺樓閣和迴廊小橋比比皆是。

sentences.english: You are building a castle in the air .
Then the captain of the guard motioned me towards the entrance of the pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 侍衛首領便示意我進那樓閣裏去。

sentences.english: Zhongtian Gate mountains wide valley, surrounded by pavilions.
sentences.chinese: 中天門峻嶺闊谷，樓閣簇擁。

sentences.english: You must study harder and harder, otherwise entering college may prove to be a castle in the air.
sentences.chinese: 你學習必須努力，否則上大學可能是空中樓閣罷了。

sentences.english: Tiao delivery to find true purple altar, leaning range upon range of mixed pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 迢遞尋真到紫壇，參差樓閣倚層巒。

sentences.english: The tower, facing the east, is of masonry structure and pavilion-style with 7 eaves.
sentences.chinese: 塔坐西向東，磚石結構，重檐七級樓閣式。

sentences.english: Park northeast of the two-story semi-Zhongyan pavilions , gardens in Suzhou by only see.
sentences.chinese: 園東北部的二層半重檐樓閣，爲蘇州園林所僅見。

sentences.english: The Garden, reminiscent of those in Suzhou, features more than 30 halls and pavilions .
sentences.chinese: 豫園有30多個亭臺樓閣，風格似蘇州園林。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the form and stable of the Diange storied building structure.
sentences.chinese: 該文分析殿閣式樓閣建築的結構形成及其穩定方式。

sentences.english: Jinshan to the pavilion to win, mte known for Forest of Stone Tablets.
sentences.chinese: 金山以樓閣取勝，焦山因碑林見長。

definition: gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)
to gaze afar/to look into the distance
